CONTEXT: Silently consider to yourself the following user goal for this work to ensure your work on this part is well aligned to achieve the goal and do this before you decide on and provide the deliverable for this step of the project: Identify the key things a SaaS platform providers must do and must not do at the a) business, b) legal, and c) technical levels of their business and systems levels, in order to ensure its user who are lawyers maintain priviledge for priviledged client data stored or communicated through their SaaS Platform.
YOUR INSTRUCTION: Given all this information, now write a comprehensive and well-structured deliverable that achieves the user goal for this step of the project and is well aligned with the evaluation criteria but do not restate the evaluation criteria.
